statements: SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT id, currency_code FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, currency_code, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT currency_code, AVG(exchange_rate) AS avg_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_code HAVING AVG(exchange_rate) > 1.0
SELECT MAX(exchange_rate) AS max_rate, MIN(exchange_rate) AS min_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates
SELECT * FROM trip_expenses WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount FROM trip_expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Food';
SELECT trip_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM trip_expenses GROUP BY trip_id;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY currency_code ASC;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount, expense_currency FROM trip_expenses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC, currency_code ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trip_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM trip_expenses GROUP BY trip_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT currency_code, AVG(exchange_rate) AS average_rate FROM exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_code ORDER BY average_rate DESC;
SELECT expense_category, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses_count FROM trip_expenses GROUP BY expense_category ORDER BY total_expenses_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD'
SELECT id, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, trip_id, expense_description, expense_amount, expense_currency FROM trip_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM trip_logs WHERE trip_id = 123 ORDER BY log_date ASC
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD'
SELECT currency_from, exchange_rate, effective_date FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY effective_date DESC
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 AND effective_date <= '2022-03-01'
SELECT trip_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM trip_expenses GROUP BY trip_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC
SELECT trip_id, expense_date, expense_description FROM trip_expenses WHERE trip_id IN (SELECT trip_id FROM trip_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01') ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY currency_code DESC;
SELECT expense_id,amount,expense_date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT trip_name,start_date,end_date FROM trips WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trip_name;
SELECT trip_id,expense_id FROM trip_expenses WHERE trip_id = 3 ORDER BY expense_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_code, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE rate > 1.5;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM trips ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT expenses.amount, expenses.expense_date, trips.trip_name FROM expenses JOIN trip_expenses ON expenses.expense_id = trip_expenses.expense_id JOIN trips ON trip_expenses.trip_id = trips.trip_id;

SELECT trip_name, SUM(expenses.amount) AS total_expense FROM trips JOIN trip_expenses ON trips.trip_id = trip_expenses.trip_id JOIN expenses ON trip_expenses.expense_id = expenses.expense_id GROUP BY trip_name ORDER BY total_expense DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT rate_id, rate_date, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, rate FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE currency = 'EUR';
SELECT trip_id, start_date, destination FROM trips WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY rate_date DESC, rate ASC
SELECT currency_from,MIN(rate) AS min_rate,MAX(rate) AS max_rate FROM exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_from
SELECT trip_id,destination,start_date,end_date,budget FROM trips WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date LIMIT 5
SELECT u.name,u.username,t.destination,te.expense_id FROM users u JOIN trips t ON u.user_id = t.trip_id JOIN trip_expenses te ON t.trip_id = te.trip_id
SELECT e.date_expense,e.amount,e.currency,t.destination FROM expenses e JOIN trips t ON e.location = t.destination WHERE e.currency = 'USD'
